description: This file contains unit tests for the 'AppComponent' in an Angular application, written using the Jasmine testing framework. It verifies component creation, presence of a title property, and correct rendering of the title in the DOM.

classes.name: AppComponent
classes.description: Main application component being tested in this file.

methods.name: should create the app
methods.description: Tests whether the AppComponent can be instantiated successfully.

methods.name: should have the 'angular' title
methods.description: Checks if the 'title' property of AppComponent is set to 'angular'.

methods.name: should render title
methods.description: Verifies that the component's template correctly displays 'Hello, angular' within an <h1> element.
